DOC.brief_summary: TOPDOCS prospective cohort study include COPD patient currently six study center Switzerland . Patients COPD GOLD stag I-IV enrol followed-up annually least 3 year . Yearly assessment include detailed patient history , quality life activity questionnaire , history exacerbation , lung function , measurement exercise capacity , measurement vascular function , exhale breath analysis blood sampling . The overall objective project establish meticulously characterized cohort COPD patient live Switzerland order allow high quality research pathogenesis , treatment complication COPD . The specific aim project determine clinically relevant COPD phenotypes biological factor influence vascular function COPD patient .
